data.title: Colorado Railroad Museum
data.meta_description: Day Out With Thomas at the Colorado Railroad Museum in Golden, Colorado is the perfect summer event for kids in the Denver Metro Area.
data.text:
Day Out With Thomas™ is a fun-filled family event that takes place at Heritage Railways across the country. Every ticket includes a train ride with a life-sized Thomas the Tank Engine as well as access to a full day of activities for all to enjoy including live entertainment, photo ops with Sir Topham Hatt, lawn games and shopping at the pop-up gift shop for exclusive Thomas swag.

Tickets for this Day Out With Thomas™ event go on sale to the public beginning Tuesday, July 30. Ticket prices are $25 for ages 1 and up (service charges and fees may apply). Capacity will be limited, and advanced tickets are required. Walk-up sales will not be available. For more information, and to purchase tickets (beginning July 30), visit www.ColoradoRailroadMuseum.org.

For a list of Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) about the Day Out With Thomas™ event at the Colorado Railroad Museum, Click Here!

ADDITIONAL DETAILS:

WHO: Day Out With Thomas™ the Tank Engine!

WHAT: Family Fun in an outdoor environment. Highlights include:

20-minute Train Ride (at a specified time) led by a full-sized, talking Thomas the Tank Engine locomotive.

Admission to select portions of the Colorado Railroad Museum with outdoor offerings and activities included

Fun activities and entertainment featuring:

Live entertainment including trainyard gameshows, puppet shows and even stilt walkers!

Say hello to Sir Topham Hatt, Controller of the Railway.

Bubble activities like bubble blowing and bubble bouncer-ball racing in the Bubble Zone.

Photo opportunities throughout the event, including with Thomas himself.

Play with Thomas & Friends toys then pick out a temporary tattoo in the Play Pod.

An activity sheet that will guide guests through the event experience highlighting the four key station stops to visit for a free giveaway.

Outdoor Scale Model Trains operating all day long at the Denver Garden Railway Society’s permanent on-site, landscaped G-gauge railroad.

Push a Locomotive Around aboard a 120-year old, “armstrong”-powered railroad turntable

Step-On Access to selected historic railroad cars and locomotives.

Pop-up gift shop on site with exclusive Thomas & Friends™ products only available at Day Out With Thomas™.

Food and drinks available on-site for purchase.

For more information about Day Out With Thomas™ at the Colorado Railroad Museum, visit our Day Out With Thomas FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions) Page by Clicking Here.

WHEN: September 7-8, 14-15, and 21-22 (Saturdays & Sunday)

Tickets include a train ride at a designated time selected at the point of purchase, plus admission to museum grounds and all activities for up to three hours. Purchase tickets online at www.dayoutwiththomas.com

WHERE: Colorado Railroad Museum, 17155 W. 44th Avenue, Golden, CO 80403

Tickets for this Day Out With Thomas™ event go on sale to the public beginning Tuesday, July 30, 2024 (tickets will go on-sale to Museum Members July 23, 2024). Ticket prices $25 for ages 1 and up – service charges and fees may apply. Advanced tickets are required. Walk-up sales will not be available.
